sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for drying glassware using heated air circulation.
sections.scope: Applicable to glassware maintenance in Pharmaceutical Analysis.
procedure: Check that the glassware dryer is clean and empty.
Place rinsed glassware on the dryer pegs or in the drying chamber.
Switch ON the power and set the required drying temperature.
Allow the glassware to dry for the required time.
Turn OFF the heater and allow the glassware to cool before removing.
Clean the dryer interior periodically to remove dust.
Unplug the unit when not in use for extended periods.
Document the usage in the equipment logbook.
precautions: Do not dry plastic items unless they are rated for high temperature.
Ensure glassware is not dripping excessively before placing it in the dryer.
Use heat-resistant gloves when handling hot glassware.
Do not block the air vents inside the dryer.
Inspect the power cord for any damage before use.
